description: Also works in the Space and Time Investigation Department of the Centre for Space and Time Management. She has come to earth in search of a husband for Maharu but ends up living at the Sasaki household instead. She vehemently opposes being treated like a child, but in actuality, she acts just like a kid. Her comments sound mature and her digs often stun people into silence. Wielding a magic wand, she can also change form.
name: Tomoka Lana Jude
